name: Baby Chaos
description:
Play as Satan incarnated as a baby! Will you climb the ranks of chaos and become a God? Or will you stay as a puny Baby? Enjoy this cute 3D chaos simulator and wreck as much havoc as you can!

This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 for the theme 'Let There Be Chaos'. 

Programmer: Aileena

Artist: Kazuma (https://kazumasei.itch.io/)

Music Composer: Caleb (https://itch.io/profile/lonic42)
